name: ABC
text: Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey says the city is working to pair new police officers with “the right individuals” for field training in the wake of George Floyd’s death. https://t.co/lPslRBwVoY

name: ABC
text: WNBA players took a stance against the co-owner of the Atlanta Dream by showing support for an opponent she is facing in a special election for her state Senate seat. https://t.co/xzQCc964uu
